ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound boneless sirloin steak, cut into thin slices
1 (14 ounce) bag Birds Eye® Recipe Ready Broccoli Stir Fry
1 (10 ounce) bag Birds Eye® Steamfresh® Long Grain White Rice, cooked according to package directions

cookingTips: Cut beef against the grain for maximum tenderness
Prepare all ingredients before cooking as stir-fries cook quickly
Use high heat to get a nice sear on the beef
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through proper knife techniques for slicing steak thinly and maintaining consistent heat during stir-frying.
